intro: Orbea doldii, commonly known as the Dold's orbea, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Apocynaceae family and is characterized by its succulent, fleshy stems and leaves. The plant produces clusters of small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It is adapted to arid environments and stores water in its thick leaves and stems. Orbea doldii is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and resilience.
